title: 1/BD 1/BA, Eco-friendly community features, Built-in desks
posting_body: ['Whether you invite friends over for a day at the pool or to show off your grill-master skills in the barbecue pavilion, Azures Apartment Homes embraces laid-back luxury and the modern comforts of today.', 'Our spacious apartment homes are outfitted with luxe details from wood-style flooring to stone countertops.', 'Plus, residents enjoy an array of indoor and outdoor amenities including a gym and fully equipped resident social lounge.', '-Terrace featuring barbecue pavilion', '-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Flexible lease terms available', '-Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating', '-Breakfast bars available', '-Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity', '-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Views', '-Onsite playground', '-Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
